<svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewBox="0 0 120 120" width="120" height="120" role="img">
  <title>Mimi le dinosaure — surexcité</title>
  <!-- Queue -->
  <path d="M30 72 Q18 68 14 58 Q12 52 16 50 Q20 48 24 54 Q28 62 34 66" fill="#2D6A4F"/>
  <!-- Corps -->
  <ellipse cx="60" cy="68" rx="28" ry="32" fill="#2D6A4F"/>
  <!-- Ventre -->
  <ellipse cx="60" cy="74" rx="18" ry="20" fill="#52B788"/>
  <!-- Pattes -->
  <ellipse cx="48" cy="98" rx="8" ry="5" fill="#2D6A4F"/>
  <ellipse cx="72" cy="98" rx="8" ry="5" fill="#2D6A4F"/>
  <!-- Tête -->
  <ellipse cx="60" cy="38" rx="22" ry="20" fill="#2D6A4F"/>
  <!-- Crête -->
  <path d="M52 20 Q54 12 58 18 Q60 10 64 18 Q66 12 68 20" fill="#52B788" stroke="#2D6A4F" stroke-width="1.5" stroke-linejoin="round"/>
  <!-- Yeux étoilés -->
  <circle cx="52" cy="36" r="6" fill="#fff"/>
  <path d="M52 30 L53.2 33.5 L56.8 33.5 L54 35.8 L55 39.2 L52 37 L49 39.2 L50 35.8 L47.2 33.5 L50.8 33.5Z" fill="#FFD700"/>
  <circle cx="68" cy="36" r="6" fill="#fff"/>
  <path d="M68 30 L69.2 33.5 L72.8 33.5 L70 35.8 L71 39.2 L68 37 L65 39.2 L66 35.8 L63.2 33.5 L66.8 33.5Z" fill="#FFD700"/>
  <!-- Bouche grande ouverte sourire -->
  <path d="M50 46 Q60 58 70 46" fill="#C1121F" stroke="#2D6A4F" stroke-width="1.2"/>
  <path d="M53 46 Q60 50 67 46" fill="#fff"/>
  <!-- Bras levés -->
  <path d="M34 58 Q26 48 22 42" stroke="#2D6A4F" stroke-width="5" stroke-linecap="round" fill="none"/>
  <path d="M86 58 Q94 48 98 42" stroke="#2D6A4F" stroke-width="5" stroke-linecap="round" fill="none"/>
  <!-- Petites étoiles -->
  <path d="M16 32 L17.5 36 L14 34 L19 34 L15.5 36Z" fill="#FFD700"/>
  <path d="M100 28 L101.5 32 L98 30 L103 30 L99.5 32Z" fill="#FFD700"/>
  <path d="M94 56 L95.5 60 L92 58 L97 58 L93.5 60Z" fill="#FFD700"/>
</svg>
SVGEOF)

<svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewBox="0 0 120 120" width="120" height="120" role="img">
  <title>Mimi le dinosaure — content</title>
  <!-- Queue -->
  <path d="M30 72 Q18 68 14 58 Q12 52 16 50 Q20 48 24 54 Q28 62 34 66" fill="#2D6A4F"/>
  <!-- Corps -->
  <ellipse cx="60" cy="68" rx="28" ry="32" fill="#2D6A4F"/>
  <!-- Ventre -->

  <!-- Pattes -->
  <ellipse cx="48" cy="98" rx="8" ry="5" fill="#2D6A4F"/>
  <ellipse cx="72" cy="98" rx="8" ry="5" fill="#2D6A4F"/>
  <!-- Tête -->
  <ellipse cx="60" cy="38" rx="22" ry="20" fill="#2D6A4F"/>
  <!-- Crête -->
  <path d="M52 20 Q54 12 58 18 Q60 10 64 18 Q66 12 68 20" fill="#52B788" stroke="#2D6A4F" stroke-width="1.5" stroke-linejoin="round"/>

  <path d="M46 36 Q52 30 58 36" stroke="#1B1B1B" stroke-width="2.5" stroke-linecap="round" fill="none"/>
  <path d="M62 36 Q68 30 74 36" stroke="#1B1B1B" stroke-width="2.5" stroke-linecap="round" fill="none"/>

  <!-- Sourire doux -->
  <path d="M52 46 Q60 54 68 46" stroke="#1B1B1B" stroke-width="2" stroke-linecap="round" fill="none"/>
  <!-- Petits bras -->

  <path d="M86 60 Q92 56 96 58" stroke="#2D6A4F" stroke-width="5" stroke-linecap="round" fill="none"/>
</svg>

<svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewBox="0 0 120 120" width="120" height="120" role="img">
  <title>Mimi le dinosaure — inquiet</title>
  <!-- Queue -->
  <path d="M30 72 Q18 70 14 62 Q12 56 16 54 Q20 52 24 58 Q28 64 34 68" fill="#2D6A4F"/>
  <!-- Corps -->
  <ellipse cx="60" cy="68" rx="28" ry="32" fill="#2D6A4F"/>
  <!-- Ventre -->
  <ellipse cx="60" cy="74" rx="18" ry="20" fill="#52B788"/>
  <!-- Pattes -->
  <ellipse cx="48" cy="98" rx="8" ry="5" fill="#2D6A4F"/>
  <ellipse cx="72" cy="98" rx="8" ry="5" fill="#2D6A4F"/>
  <!-- Tête -->
  <ellipse cx="60" cy="38" rx="22" ry="20" fill="#2D6A4F"/>
  <!-- Crête -->
  <path d="M52 20 Q54 12 58 18 Q60 10 64 18 Q66 12 68 20" fill="#52B788" stroke="#2D6A4F" stroke-width="1.5" stroke-linejoin="round"/>
  <!-- Sourcils relevés -->
  <line x1="46" y1="26" x2="56" y2="28" stroke="#1B1B1B" stroke-width="2" stroke-linecap="round"/>
  <line x1="74" y1="26" x2="64" y2="28" stroke="#1B1B1B" stroke-width="2" stroke-linecap="round"/>
  <!-- Yeux écarquillés -->
  <circle cx="52" cy="35" r="6" fill="#fff"/>
  <circle cx="52" cy="36" r="3" fill="#1B1B1B"/>
  <circle cx="53.5" cy="34.5" r="1" fill="#fff"/>
  <circle cx="68" cy="35" r="6" fill="#fff"/>
  <circle cx="68" cy="36" r="3" fill="#1B1B1B"/>
  <circle cx="69.5" cy="34.5" r="1" fill="#fff"/>
  <!-- Bouche inquiète \(petite ondulation\) -->
  <path d="M53 48 Q57 46 60 48 Q63 50 67 48" stroke="#1B1B1B" stroke-width="2" stroke-linecap="round" fill="none"/>
  <!-- Goutte de sueur -->
  <path d="M78 28 Q80 34 78 38 Q76 34 78 28Z" fill="#7EC8E3" opacity="0.8"/>
  <!-- Petits bras \(serrés\) -->
  <path d="M34 62 Q30 64 28 68" stroke="#2D6A4F" stroke-width="5" stroke-linecap="round" fill="none"/>
  <path d="M86 62 Q90 64 92 68" stroke="#2D6A4F" stroke-width="5" stroke-linecap="round" fill="none"/>
</svg>
SVGEOF)

Bash("c:/Users/QuentinLooze/OneDrive - Le Hublot/Documents/Dev/Mimitask 2/assets/mascot/mimi-sad.svg" << 'SVGEOF'
<svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewBox="0 0 120 120" width="120" height="120" role="img">
  <title>Mimi le dinosaure — triste</title>
  <!-- Queue \(tombante\) -->
  <path d="M30 74 Q18 76 14 82 Q12 86 16 88 Q20 86 24 80 Q28 74 34 72" fill="#2D6A4F"/>
  <!-- Corps -->
  <ellipse cx="60" cy="68" rx="28" ry="32" fill="#2D6A4F"/>
  <!-- Ventre -->
  <ellipse cx="60" cy="74" rx="18" ry="20" fill="#52B788"/>
  <!-- Pattes -->
  <ellipse cx="48" cy="98" rx="8" ry="5" fill="#2D6A4F"/>
  <ellipse cx="72" cy="98" rx="8" ry="5" fill="#2D6A4F"/>
  <!-- Tête -->
  <ellipse cx="60" cy="38" rx="22" ry="20" fill="#2D6A4F"/>
  <!-- Crête -->
  <path d="M52 20 Q54 12 58 18 Q60 10 64 18 Q66 12 68 20" fill="#52B788" stroke="#2D6A4F" stroke-width="1.5" stroke-linejoin="round"/>
  <!-- Sourcils tristes -->
  <line x1="47" y1="28" x2="55" y2="26" stroke="#1B1B1B" stroke-width="2" stroke-linecap="round"/>
  <line x1="73" y1="28" x2="65" y2="26" stroke="#1B1B1B" stroke-width="2" stroke-linecap="round"/>
  <!-- Yeux tombants -->
  <circle cx="52" cy="35" r="5" fill="#fff"/>
  <circle cx="52" cy="36" r="2.5" fill="#1B1B1B"/>
  <circle cx="53" cy="35" r="0.8" fill="#fff"/>
  <circle cx="68" cy="35" r="5" fill="#fff"/>
  <circle cx="68" cy="36" r="2.5" fill="#1B1B1B"/>
  <circle cx="69" cy="35" r="0.8" fill="#fff"/>
  <!-- Petite larme -->
  <path d="M74 38 Q76 44 74 48 Q72 44 74 38Z" fill="#7EC8E3"/>
  <!-- Bouche vers le bas -->
  <path d="M53 50 Q60 44 67 50" stroke="#1B1B1B" stroke-width="2" stroke-linecap="round" fill="none"/>
  <!-- Bras tombants -->
  <path d="M34 62 Q28 68 24 74" stroke="#2D6A4F" stroke-width="5" stroke-linecap="round" fill="none"/>
  <path d="M86 62 Q92 68 96 74" stroke="#2D6A4F" stroke-width="5" stroke-linecap="round" fill="none"/>
</svg>
SVGEOF)
